sgiers: Our dearly beloved Mister Sgier took on the duty of best men for this joyous occasion. And the charming Misses Sgier will be attending this event with the titel of Maid of highest Honor. They both have dealt with for the past 15 years
vanessa: Our amazing Vanessa will join the brides party as bridesmaid.
julia: Fellow friendly geek Julia will suport our special day as one of our bridsmaids.
